name: Troubled Waters (Coffee Bat)
description: The goal: You gotta go as deep as you can survive in an ocean cave, collecting coins to buy weapons on the StoreOS computers along the way, to defend yourself from hostile ocean creatures The weapons: Bombs: Clear all enemies on screen Harpoon: Shoot it to kill enemies Lethal Jellyfish Launcher (L.J.L™) : Chooses an enemy to kill instantly The controls: X - Use available weapon Z - Exit menu's Arrows - Move the player
